column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////...it arrived. Not very ceremoniously and soul-crushingly small (to be fair it was personal size). I took my first bite
column3: cheesy and pizza-y everything I expected a pizza to be... but nothing spectacular. The good thing about pizza is that it is good
column4: even when it's bad (*insert sex joke here*)
column5: Lou Malnati's pizza is for lack of a better word: good
column6: but as far as the hype goes
column7: expect to be merely "-whelmed" neither over or under.
